title: Still waiting for the PAX skins...
body: Bought my tickets MONTHS before Riot announces they weren't coming to PAX. Sent two emails (one ages ago, one recently) to the the address provided, both with the required evidence. Got the auto replies but still haven't heard anything with an actual response. Not sure what to do now.

replies.body:
Hey Rastabaxus,

I'm not so sure what the issue is here. Could you provide a bit more information and context of what happened and what you're looking for?

its pretty obvious, they were going to give out skins at pax if they attended (but they didnt so they give them to them via codes in an email)
you're from NA this is an OCE problem

Here's the recent Red response regarding the question:
> [{quoted}](name=GeneralCoxy,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=jgOY2HZQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-26T02:31:31.598+0000)
>
> Hey, we are a little behind on these so I will aim to get them all distributed as soon as possible.

I'm STILL waiting lol, this is pretty ridiculous.

Same issue as http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/eiVoqsBA-pax-aus-skins

I have replied there also.
